name: Python 3 Tutorials | Learn Python Tutorial free
description: What is python programming ? -> Python is a general-purpose interpreted, interactive, object-oriented, and high-level programming language. Python is todays most demanding programming language, specially in software developer job.   If you are looking for any easy and simple way to learn python programming then, you are at right place.python 3 tutorials will provide you best python learning material.   Why you should use ? -> Here it does not matter weather you are a beginner or a advance learner of python programming, this will help you in both cases. If you have any problem with understanding high English words then, do not worry this python tutorials are written in simple English words.   What are the things you will learn here ? -> This python tutorials are divided in some phase, such as..  # Python keywords - our journey will start with all python programming keyword. It is important to know because python introduces some new keywords, which is not present in other programming. after this our actual journey begins.  # Learn basic python  - Here you will learn core python topics. It will make your basic understanding strong with python coding. It will set you for going further.  # Learn advance python - Here you will get some advance topics such as, OOP with python , Python CGI, Regular Expression etc.  # Lean MySQL with python - Here you will enter another level in python, you will deal with database. You will get basic explanation of database connectivity and its operation with sort of good examples.   # Learn MongoDB with python - This is a alternative of MySQL. But this is a smart way to deal with database. You will get good knowledge of it.  # Learn python GUI programming with Python TKinter. - TKinter is very popular library to develop desktop application and other. You will learn complete python TKinter here.  # Python programming examples - If you learn any programming but you do not much practice of it then, it is useless. If you will do practice more then only you will get command of programming. Hence for that, Learn python 3 tutorials has 200 plus python programs. All the programs are listed by its topic wise.   1. Simple programs 2. Mathematical programs 3. List programs 4. String programs 5. Dictionary programs 6. Sets programs 7. Recursion and without Recursion programs 8. Tuples programs 9. File handling programs 10. OOP programs 11. Searching ans Sorting programs  # Python interview questions and answers. - Interview questions is much important. weather you are preparing for a job interview or an exam. It can help in both. Learn python provides you interview questions on several topics.  1. Python interview questions 2. Python GUI(TKinter) interview questions 3. Python Numpy interview questions 4. Python Django interview questions 5. Python Pandas interview questions   # Python compiler  - you will get coding are here, but it can only help you in core python programming.   Story does not get end here. Now you will learn some interesting and most demanding(For a job perspective) python Technology.  # Learn Django  - Django is a Python-based free and open-source web framework, which follows the model-template-view (MTV) architectural pattern. It is a one of the most demanding framework for web development till date. - You will get complete knowledge of Python Django framework. Not only you will learn it but also you will learn to make your first application from scratch.  # learn Numpy - NumPy is a general-purpose array-processing package. It provides a high-performance multidimensional array object and many more. - You will get complete guidance for using numpy and good practice of it.   ### In Short this will get your python knowledge next level. thank you....  references:  -www. javatpoint.com -www. tutorialpoint.com - www.sanfoundry.com - www.iconfinder.com - www.rextester.com other...
